pages.text: "Any technology advanced enough is indistinguishable from magic," you once heard.\You're still not entirely sure how this storage system manages to store so many blocks in such a small space, but since you regularly walk around with hundreds of square metres of dirt, you've never bothered to question it.

pages.title: Growth Acceleration
pages.text: Looks like - despite the name - the [#](bb00bb)Crystal Growth Accelerator[#]() can grow more than just quartz! It can also grow other types of gemstones.

pages.title: Quartz Auto-Harvesting
pages.text: The [Crystal Apothecary](entry://magic/crystal_apothecary) not only harvests [#](bb00bb)Gemstone Buds[#](), but also [#](bb00bb)Certus Quartz[#]().

pages.title: Moving Budding Quartz
pages.text: Tools enchanted with [Resonance](entry://enchanting/resonance) are able to harvest [#](bb00bb)Budding Quartz[#](), while retaining their _flawless_ state.

pages.title: Anvil Crushing
pages.text: Many of AE2's items can be [crushed to dust with an anvil](entry://general/anvil_crushing): [#](bb00bb)Certus Quartz[#](), [#](bb00bb)Fluix[#](), [#](bb00bb)Skystone[#]() and [#](bb00bb)Ender Pearls[#]().
In desperate need of [#](bb00bb)Charged Certus Quartz[#]()? [Storm Stones](entry://resources/storm_stone) will charge them up in a heartbeat.

pages.title: Certus Crushing
pages.text: ...and then create [#](bb00bb)Fluix[#]() from it, if you get impatient.

pages.title: Certus Charging
pages.text: Being crystalline structures, [#](bb00bb)Certus Quartz[#]() and [#](bb00bb)Fluix Crystals[#]() can be grown in the Crystallarieum.
